topic: What is the default setting for rtrace
body:
Hi all,


I am wondering what is the default value for each parameter we can set in rtrace.
Looking at website (http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/man_html/rtrace.1.html), I only can find what that parameter means.
Does anyone know where I can find those information?
If no, could you tell me what is the default value for -dr since I was wondering how this parameter affect to the daylight calculation with reflector.


Thank you.
Katsuya
